title: China’s PBOC Extends Gold-Buying Streak as Metal’s Rally Cools
description: China’s central bank added to its gold reserves for a 13th straight month, according to data released on Sunday.
content: China’s central bank added to its gold reserves for a 13th straight month, according to data released on Sunday.
